segments.text: I'm observing a scene with several layers of activity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My attention is drawn to a boy on a two-step stool near the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly wobbly, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely worried it's going to tip over at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far up to reach the cookie jar; it's a dangerous pose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His precarious balance makes my stomach clench with concern.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to this very obvious danger?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, albeit facing away, but still in the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just a matter of time before that stool goes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a growing sense of frustration that such a risk is being ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should really secure that stool or help the child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the crash if he falls backward with a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation feels like a recipe for a painful accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
